metadata.title: Get the most out of Xcode Cloud

abstract.text: Discover how you can get the most out of Xcode Cloud, Apple‚Äôs continuous integration and continuous delivery (CI/CD) service. We‚Äôll take you through an overview of Xcode Cloud and how it connects with Xcode and App Store Connect. We‚Äôll also explore the Xcode Cloud Usage Dashboard in App Store Connect, and learn how you can use this tool to help optimize your build and release process across multiple team projects.

abstract.text: Xcode 14, Swift 5.7, iOS 16, macOS 13 (Ventura), tvOS 16, watchOS 9.
Session notes shared by the community for the community.

Learn how you can use Apple‚Äôs continuous integration and continuous delivery (CI/CD) service with development teams of any size to help you deliver high-quality apps. We‚Äôll show you how to integrate Xcode Cloud into your team‚Äôs existing app development process and efficiently use Xcode Cloud in your CI/CD practice. We‚Äôll also demonstrate how you can use the App Store Connect API to integrate Xcode Cloud with an issue tracker, explore code dependency management, and share best practices.

Author fast and reliable tests for Xcode Cloud

abstract.text: Discover how you can create effective testing plans for Xcode Cloud, Apple‚Äôs continuous integration and continuous delivery service. We‚Äôll show you how testing can be an essential tool to consistently verify your code works correctly. Learn how you can author fast, reliable, and efficient tests for Xcode Cloud, avoid irrelevant failures, and verify your code changes quickly.
